data.text:
@Nicole_H31 Hello Nicole,
please provide us the claim file number via DM in order to verify. Thank you.

@vsalles_ Hello Vanessa,
we have replied via DM. Thank you.
@NikkiChagra @nikkichagra Hello Nicole, thank you for your feedback. If you have additional questions, please let us know.

@Legumendoas @legumendoas Olá, informamos que poderá consultar a lista de refeições especiais disponíveis aqui: https://t.co/ar8WUNFaGT
Obrigado.

urls.title: Refeições especiais | TAP Air Portugal
urls.description: Conheça as refeições especialmente feitas para si

data.text: @cedraz_diego Olá, respondemos por mensagem privada. Obrigado.

@Ellesmama1 @ellesmama1 Hello Ellesmama, can you provide us with a screenshot of the e-mail you've received by direct message, so that it can be verified?
Thank you.

@acruzarelcharco @NauticoNET1998 Se continuar sem conseguir concluir a sua passagem, pedimos que nos envie, por mensagem privada, um print screen do constrangimento e os dados da sua reserva. Disponha se necessitar de ajuda adicional. Obrigado. (II/II)

@acruzarelcharco @NauticoNET1998 Olá, lamentamos imenso a situação e todos os constrangimentos causados. De forma a efetuar a sua reserva, solicitamos que limpe os cookies do seu browser e tente novamente através do Google Chrome. (I/II)

@saninemoreira @saninemoreira Hello Sanine, we are sorry for the inconvenience. If we can help with some question through this channel, please provide with your booking code. For security reasons, we suggest that you send it by direct message. 
Thank you.
@HevMM01 @hevmm01Hello Heather, we replied to your direct messages. Thank you.
@2MonkeysTravel Hello Kach, your request is being processed and it will be finalized as soon as possible. If you have any other questions we can help you with, feel free to contact us. Thank you.

This Halloween, meet the scariest side of our destinations. 👻
From sinister to creepy, can you make it to the maximum level? Good luck to the bravest ones! 🎃
Book your trip now and get to know all these places up close in https://t.co/ihLfQ3U2ki. https://t.co/JreXEiPPSC

data.text:
Este Halloween, conheçam o lado mais assustador dos nossos destinos. 👻
De sinistro a arrepiante, conseguem chegar ao nível máximo? Boa sorte para os mais corajosos! 🎃
Reservem já a vossa viagem e conheçam de perto todos estes locais em https://t.co/ihLfQ3U2ki. https://t.co/I0QrwRyRBR

data.text:
@rajeshkal123 @rajeshkal123 Hello RAJESH, can you provide us with your booking code? For security reasons we suggest that you send it by direct message. 
Thank you.
@risquete @risquete Hola Jaume, hemos contestado por mensaje directo. Gracias.

@mikesyard @mikesyard Hello Mike, we are sorry for any constraints. Can you provide us with your booking code so that it can be verified? For security reasons, we suggest that you send it by direct message. 
Thank you.
@ndfeed @ndfeed Hello, thank you for your words 🙂

@iamstevecook @iamstevecook Hello SC, can you provide us with your Tag number and booking code? For security reasons we suggest to send it by direct message. 
Thank you.

@Attilapia @attilapia Hello Pia, we sincerely regret the inconvenience. Can you provide us with the PIR number, so that it can be verified? For security reasons, we suggest that you send it by direct message. 
Thank you.

@AsikainenElina @asikainenelina Hello Elina, can you provide us with the complaint number, so that it can be verified? For security reasons we suggest that you do it by direct message. 
Thank you.

@NikkiChagra @nikkichagra Hello Nicole, we sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. Can you please provide us with that PIR code regarding your lost property? For security reasons, we suggest that you send it by direct message. 
Thank you.

@ANGIEPOPS11 @angiepops11 Hello Angelique, we sincerely regret that the experience did not meet your expectations. If we can help with some question through this channel, please let us know.
Thank you.
@forrwithmycat Hola myswetheart, ¿puede indicarnos el código de reserva, por favor? Por razones de seguridad, le sugerimos que lo haga por mensaje privado. Gracias.

@Smvmc89 Olá Sandra,

poderia nos indicar, por mensagem privada, o seu número de processo de reclamação e endereço de email associado, para que possamos verificar, por favor? Obrigado.

@TerrenzVM Hello Terrence,

can you inform us through DM your booking reference or electronic ticket number (047...) so we may verify? The arrangement of possible accommodation can only managed at the airport staff directly and not over this channel.

@Dynamo17Pratik Hello Patrik,

the airlines are not responsible for informing passenger which documentation or requirements are mandatory in order to enter in a certain country. All information necessary to travel are full responsibility of the passengers. Thank you.

data.text: @Run_itt Can you inform us thr through DM your complaint file number and email adress related so we may verify? Thank you.

@Run_itt Hello Ronit,

how may we assist you? Can you clarify through DM your situation so we may verify? Thank you.

@Prof_Baptista Agradecemos o envio da informação.
Caso necessite de alguma ajuda adicional, não hesite em contactar-nos. (2/2)

@Marion_Adln De rien, Marion.
Nous restons à votre disposition pour tout renseignement complémentaire. Merci.
@MJOneDone For confidentiality reasons, we suggest you send it by private message. Thank you in advance.  2/2

@MJOneDone Hello MJRunner, we apologise for all the distress caused by this situation. In order to verify the information, can you please inform us your complaints reference number and your email address? 1/2

data.text:
@EddieLee42 Hello Eddie, we are sorry that the service did not meet your expectations. If we can help with some question through this channel, please let us know. 
Thank you.
@yu26440222 Hello yu, we have replied by private message. Thank you.
@benedetta_dc Hello Benedetta, we have replied to your private message. Thank you.

@StefaniBertrand @dgccrf @DGAC Bonjour BertrandStefani,
Nous vous prions de nous indiquer votre numéro de réclamation et votre adresse email afin que nous puissions vérifier cette situation.
Nous vous recommandons de le faire par message privé pour des raisons de confidentialité. 
Merci
@SuriR Hello Suri, we have replied to your private message. Thank you.

@Santambreus @ItalyinPortugal @turismoportugal @dntwit Hello Nicolò.
Thank you for the information.
If our assistance is still needed, please let us know.
Thank you

@Santambreus Hello Nicolò, can you provide with the booking code, so that it can be verified?
For security reasons we suggest that you send it by direct message. Thank you.
@injuredcheetah Hello Siddant, we have replied to your DM. Thank you.
@c1othes11 Hello Kevin, we have replied by private message. Thank you.

@pazziniju @pazziniju Olá, pode por favor indicar-nos o código de reserva por forma a verificar?
Por motivos de confidencialidade sugerimos o envio por mensagem direta. Obrigada.

@HerrGeissler Hello Christian,

can you inform us through DM your booking reference or electronic ticket number (047...) so we may verify? Thank you.

@Portos75 Olá Basilio,

refere-se a que voo, mais propriamente? Poderia clarificar, por favor?

@shay_muc Hello Miss Shay,

can you inform us through DM your lost luggage file number (PIR), bag tag and booking reference related so we may verify? Thank you.

@zahidahmedch Hello Zahid,

We sincerely apologize for the situation mentioned and the inconvenience caused. TAP Air Portugal works everyday in order to promote our passenger satisfaction and to improve our services. In case you require our assistance, please let us know. Thank yo
@amey_9879 Hello Amey, can you please provide us the booking reference? For security reasons, we suggest you do so by private message. Thank you.

@gmoxyz @WebSummit Hello, in order to verify, please provide us the booking reference and the e-ticket number. For confidentiality reasons, we suggest you to send the details by private message. Thank you.
